verses.name: Judges 6:10
verses.text: And I said unto you, I am the Lord your God; fear not the gods of the Amorites, in whose land ye dwell: but ye have not obeyed my voice.

verses.name: Judges 6:11
verses.text: And there came an angel of the Lord, and sat under an oak which was in Ophrah, that pertained unto Joash the Abi–ezrite: and his son Gideon threshed wheat by the winepress, to hide it from the Midianites.

verses.name: Judges 6:12
verses.text: And the angel of the Lord appeared unto him, and said unto him, The Lord is with thee, thou mighty man of valour.
